summary: Contoso Wireless offers a variety of features and services to help prevent customer churn, including a rewards program, 24/7 customer service, flexible contracts, access to exclusive discounts on popular phones and accessories, and free access to their customer support app. They also offer TV services such as access to streaming services like Netflix and Hulu as well as live TV channels like ABC and NBC. These services provide reliable service with no buffering or lag time, always up-to-date channels and content, and free customer support should any issue arise.
